00022 #ifndef INSTALLED_FILE_H
00023 #define INSTALLED_FILE_H
00024 
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 #include <libxml/tree.h>
00028 
00029 using std::string;
00030 using std::vector;
00031 
00034 class InstalledFile
00035 {
00036 public:
00037   InstalledFile();
00038   InstalledFile(string filename);
00039   ~InstalledFile();
00040   string GetFilename() const;
00041   void SetFilename(string filename);
00042   string GetBackupFilename() const;
00043   string GetChecksum() const;
00044   void SetChecksum(string checksum);
00045   bool IsAnInheritedFile() const;
00046   void SetInherited(bool inherited);
00047   bool NeedsBackedUp() const;
00048   bool IsABackupFile() const;
00049   void SetBackup(bool backupState);
00050   bool Save(xmlNodePtr parentNode);
00051   bool Load(xmlNodePtr fileNode);
00052   bool operator==(const InstalledFile& refFile) const;
00053   bool operator<(const InstalledFile& refFile) const;
00054 private:
00056   string mFilename;
00058   string mFilePart;
00060   string mDirectory;
00062   string mChecksum;
00064   bool mIsABackupFile;
00066   bool mIsAnInheritedFile;
00067 };
00068 
00070 class InstalledFileVector : public vector<InstalledFile *>
00071 {
00072 public:
00073   void push_back(InstalledFile* element);
